nodes.text: Boba Fett's motif is a piece written by John Williams for The Empire Strikes Back soundtrack and was performed by the London Symphony Orchestra in 1980. It represents the character Boba Fett and is heard twice during the track "Departure of Boba Fett", firstly, when Fett escorts the carbon-frozen Han Solo through Cloud City, and secondly, when he orders Solo placed aboard his ship.

Another motif associated with Boba Fett is heard during the tracks "Imperial Starfleet", "City in the Clouds" and "Betrayal at Bespin", when Fett is hired by Darth Vader, stealthily pursues the Millennium Falcon, and reveals himself on Cloud City, respectively.
